name: ecobalyse
description: Accélérer l'affichage environnemental de la filière textile française
author: Ecobalyse <contact@beta.gouv.fr>

scripts.build: npm run server:build && rimraf dist && npm run build:init && parcel build index.html --public-url ./
scripts.build:init: ./bin/update-version.sh && npm run generate-impacts && mkdir -p dist && cp -r public/* dist/
scripts.server:build: npm run db:build && npm run generate-impacts && elm make src/Server.elm --optimize --output=server-app.js
scripts.server:dev: npm run server:build && nodemon server.js --config nodemon.json
scripts.server:debug: elm make src/Server.elm --output=server-app.js && nodemon server.js --config nodemon.json
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:init && concurrently -n "watch,parcel,server" -c "green,cyan" "npm run start:parcel" "npm run server:dev"
scripts.test: npm run db:build && npm run test:review && npm run test:client && npm run test:server
